short_summary: Aggregate and Riprap Production - Contract ID: WS4236229889-Doc4310779266
description: These works involve the following (including Optional work which may not be undertaken by PSPC): But is not limited to Crushing, hauling, and stockpiling 16.0mm B.S.T. aggregates, 12.5mm sanding aggregates and riprap. \nSupply crawler tractor complete with ripper and 260-359 FWHP for pit clean-up after completion of crushing aggregates.
full_summary:
=============================================

*   **Title (English/Français)**: EZ899-240738 Phase II Aggregate and Riprap Production - Km 262 to Km 922 Alaska Highway, BC 
    *   Aggregate and Riprap Production, Phase II - km 262 to km 922, Autoroute de L'Alaska [C-B]
*   **Reference Number (Numéro de Référence): WS4236229889)
    *   Solicitation Number (Numéro de Sollicitation): WS4236229889
*   **Amendment Number (Numéro de Modification): 7**
*   **Publication Date (Date de Publication): 2023-11-15**
*   **Tender Closing Date (Date de Clôture de l'Offre de Marchandise): 2024-01-22T14:00:00**
*   **Amendment Date (Date de Modification): 2024-01-16** 
*   **Expected Contract Start Date (Date prévue du Début de Contrat): 2024-01-19**
*   **Expected Contract End Date (Date prévue de Fin de Contrat): 2025-03-31**
*   **Tender Status (Statut de l'Offre de Marchandise): Expiré**
*   **Procurement Category (Categorie d'approvisionnement): CNST**
*   **Procurement Method (Methode d'approvisionnement): Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif**
*   **Selection Criteria (Critères de sélection): Prix le plus bas**
*   **Trade Agreements (Accords commerciaux): *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) *  
*   **Region of Opportunity (Région de l'opportunité): *Canada*

**Description of Work**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services [PSPC] hereby invites qualified contractors to participate in the tendering process for the EZ899-240738 Phase II Aggregate and Riprap Production - Km 262 to Km 922 Alaska Highway, BC contract.

The work under this contract includes the following (including Optional Work which may or may not be undertaken by PSPC): crushing, hauling, and stockpiling 16mm B.S.T. aggregates, 12.5mm sanded aggregates, and riprap. Contractors must also supply a crawler tractor complete with a ripper and 260-359 FWHP for pit clean
